metadata.name: OBSERVATION #1 - THE METAVERSE
metadata.description:
[KLAYRock : OBSERVATIONS 01] THE METAVERSE

What makes the "Metaverse" so appealing? The opportunity to connect with others? A way to escape the realties of life? Is it just a fad? 

Societal effects of the pandemic has been felt across all touchpoints of life; from work to play. The way we socialize and connect has changed forever as an unprecedented paradigm shift sweeps the world. 

How will our new enthusiasm for virtual living impact society?

Good or bad, these are the questions that are explored in this observation of how our attitudes and societal norms are rapidly shifting after decades of nominal change.
